nodes.text: Kjus Androth was a male Jedi of the Jedi Order. According to myth, Androth, along with Petano Dreth, was enlisted by Jedi Knight Sol Mogra for assistance in seeking out a mysterious figure rampaging throughout the Coruscant Underworld. Unaware to Mogra, the figure was himself, affected by the dark emotions within the amulet he wore. While Androth was on patrol during the night, Mogra killed him, later waking to hear of his death.
